FROM SnC MARITIME SEOUL KOREA 82-2-778-0283 DRY@SNCMARITIME.COM - SS Kang

 

CLOSE LOCAL ONWERS HV : -

 

- OPEN PANJANG 26/31 AUG 2024

 

 

MV. T PRIME
- LAST CGOS : FERTILIZER(CURRENT) - REBARS/INGOT – STEEL PRODUCT - FERRO NICKEL - STEEL - WOOD PELLET

- CAN TRY ANY

- HRC 25MT X 2TIERS OK / AVAILABLE ON-DECK CARGO

- BOD LSFO ABT 900-1,000MT / LSMGO ABT 50-100 MT

 

 

VESSELS’ PARTICULAR

BULK CARRIER, KR CLASS,

A60 BULKHEAD, CO2 FITTED,

MARSHALL/2011BLT, 32,451.30MTDWT ON 10.15M SSW,

L/B/D 179.90/28.40/14.10, G/NRT 20,867/11,821 MT,

5H/5H, 4 X 30.5MT CRNS, G/B 43,460.8/41,420.07 M3,

HATCH SIZE H1 14.4X17.6, H2-4 20.0X19.2, H5 18.4X19.2,

HOLD NO.2-4 ARE BOX TYPE.

ADA

 

SPEED / CONS

SEA : ABT 11.5L / ABT 11.8B KNOTS, ABT 20.5MT IFO380 + ABT 0.1MT MDO

PORT : ABT 4.5MT IFO380+ABT 0.1MT MDO WORKING, ABT 3.0MT IFO380+ ABT 0.1MT MDO IDLE

SPEED/CONSUMPTION IS IN GOOD WEATHER/SMOOTH SEAS AND UNDERSTOOD TO MEAN ALL WEATHER

CONDITIONS NOT EXCEEDING FORCE BEAUFORT SCALE 4 AND DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 WITH NO ADVERSE CURRENT.

VSL'S M/E MAY BURN DO, GO AND / OR EXTRA FO DURING THE WHOLE CHARTER PERIOD WHILE ENTERING AND

LEAVING PORT OR MANOUVERING OR STEAMING IN CONFINED OR RESTRICTED/SHALLOW WATER, TRANSITING CANALS,

BALLASTING AND DEBALLASTING OPERATIONS AND STOPPING STARTING THE ENGINES AND USING CRANES ALL DETAILS ABOUT.

MIXING BUNKERS NOT ALLOWED.

FUEL OIL SPECIFICATION : ISO 8217-2010

ECO (IN GOOD FAITH & WOG)

ABT 11.0L/ ABT 11.3B KNOTS, ABT 18.1 MT IFO380 + ABT 0.1MT MDO

ADA WOG
